configured relevant network components to ensure database access as well as database consistency and integrity Troubleshoot and resolved various Oracle connectivity problems Provided troubleshooting assistance to all issues and concerns related to Oracle Forms Performed balancing on the scalability of data conversion and configuration Provided network troubleshooting and administrative support
